title: My account is stuck in the transfering process

embed.description: Snaggy is an image hosting service that lets you paste images from your clipboard directly online.

body:
(the account name on my account is "infinityfeels911" and the summoner name is the same. im not able to log into my account as its stuck in between the servers so i cant choose the right server to log it in or something. !ON BOTH WEBSITE AND LOL CLIENT!) 

Hey its me infinityfeels911 here, i bought 3k ish rp and bought server transfer from NA to EUW 2 days ago since i have friends and brother who play at EUW. I havent been able to log into the account since then :( please fix this im really looking forward to play with my brother since im living with him for 1 week.

replies.body: EU is currently going through an unplanned maintenance, and transfers may have been impacted.  Once maintenance is over, everything should transfer over smoothly but reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if the transfer doesn't seem to budge.
